00039 #include <QCalendarWidget>
00040 #include <QDate>
00041 #include <QDateTime>
00042 #include <QMessageBox>
00043 
00044 #include "SunPosDialog.h"
00045 #include "MapDialog.h"
00046 #include "sunpos.h"
00047 #include "tgc.h"
00048 
00049 SunPosDialog::SunPosDialog( QWidget* parent )
00050 : QDialog( parent )
00051 {
00052         setupUi(this);
00053         setFixedSize( QSize( 840, 460 ) );
00054         
00055         connect( calendarWidget, SIGNAL( selectionChanged( ) ), this, SLOT( CalculateSunPosition( ) ) );
00056         
00057         connect( uTimeSpin, SIGNAL( timeChanged ( QTime ) ), this, SLOT( CalculateSunPosition( ) ) );
00058         connect( cTimeSpin, SIGNAL( timeChanged ( QTime ) ), this, SLOT( CalculateSunPosition( ) ) );
00059         connect( zoneSpin, SIGNAL( valueChanged ( int) ), this, SLOT( CalculateSunPosition( ) ) );
00060         
00061         connect( longitudeSpin, SIGNAL( valueChanged (  double ) ), this, SLOT( CalculateSunPosition( ) ) );
00062         connect( longitudeSpin, SIGNAL( valueChanged (  double ) ), worldMap, SLOT( LocalLongitudeChanged( double ) ) );
00063         connect( latitudeSpin, SIGNAL( valueChanged ( double) ), this, SLOT( CalculateSunPosition( ) ) );
00064         
00065         connect( this, SIGNAL( changeRepresentation( cSunCoordinates ) ), worldMap, SLOT( SunChanged( cSunCoordinates ) ) );
00066         connect( this, SIGNAL( changeRepresentation( cSunCoordinates ) ), horizontalWidget, SLOT( CoordinatesChanged( cSunCoordinates ) ) );
00067         connect( this, SIGNAL( changeRepresentation( cSunCoordinates ) ), celestialWidget, SLOT( CoordinatesChanged( cSunCoordinates ) ) );
00068 }
00069 
00070 SunPosDialog::~SunPosDialog()
00071 {
00072         
00073 }
00074 
00075 void SunPosDialog::SetDateTime( QDateTime time )
00076 {
00077         uTimeSpin->setTime( time.time() );
00078         cTimeSpin->setTime( time.time() );
00079         zoneSpin->setValue( 0 );
00080         calendarWidget-> setSelectedDate( time.date() );
00081 }
00082     
00083 void SunPosDialog::ChangePosition( QDateTime time, double longitude, double latitude )
00084 {
00085         calendarWidget->setSelectedDate( time.date() );
00086         UT->setChecked( true);
00087         uTimeSpin->setTime( time.time() );
00088         
00089         longitudeSpin->setValue( longitude );
00090         latitudeSpin->setValue( latitude );
00091 }
00092 
00093 void SunPosDialog::on_updateButton_clicked()
00094 {       
00095         
00096         //CalculateSunPosition();
00097         QDateTime* time = GetTime();
00098         
00099         emit changeSunLight( time, longitudeSpin->value(), latitudeSpin->value() );
00100 
00101 }
00102 
00103 void SunPosDialog::CalculateSunPosition()
00104 {
00105 
00106    //Fecha y Hora
00107         QDateTime* time = GetTime();
00108 
00109         int year = time->date().year();
00110         int month = time->date().month();
00111         int day = time->date().day();
00112         
00113         double hours = time->time().hour ();
00114         double minutes = time->time().minute ();
00115         double seconds = time->time().second ();
00116         cTime myTime = { year, month, day, hours, minutes, seconds };
00117 
00118         //Localization
00119         double longitude = longitudeSpin->value();
00120         double latitude = latitudeSpin->value();
00121     cLocation myLocation = {longitude , latitude };
00122     
00123         //Calculate sun position
00124         cSunCoordinates results;
00125         sunpos( myTime, myLocation, &results );
00126     
00127     emit changeRepresentation(results); 
00128 }
00129 
00130 void SunPosDialog::on_selectButton_clicked()
00131 {
00132         MapDialog marbleDialog;
00133         marbleDialog.SetCoordinates( longitudeSpin->value()*( tgc::Pi / 180), -latitudeSpin->value()*( tgc::Pi / 180) );
00134         if( marbleDialog.exec() )
00135         {
00136                 double longitude;
00137                 double latitude;
00138                 marbleDialog.GetCoordinates( &longitude, &latitude );
00139         
00140         longitudeSpin->setValue( longitude * ( 180 / tgc::Pi ) );
00141         latitudeSpin->setValue( latitude * ( 180 / tgc::Pi ) );
00142     }
00143 }
00144 
00145 QDateTime* SunPosDialog::GetTime()
00146 {
00147         QDateTime* dateTime = new QDateTime;
00148         dateTime->setDate( calendarWidget->selectedDate() );
00149         
00150         QTime time;
00151         if(SunPosDialog::UT->isChecked())
00152                 dateTime->setTime( uTimeSpin->time() );
00153         else
00154         {
00155                 dateTime->setTime( cTimeSpin->time() );
00156                 dateTime->addSecs( zoneSpin->value() * 3600 );
00157         }
00158                         
00159 
00160         return dateTime;
00161 }
